main.name: Resalat Amin
main.description: I can design and program websites and web applications. In addition, I teach people how to design a website.
main.bio: A recent graduate from North South University. Looking for a IT job to secure my position. I am very hard-working. I can able to handle multiple tasks on a daily basis. In addition, I use creative approach to problem solve. My eventual career goal is to assume responsibility for the analysis and implementation and actively contribute to the overall success of any IT job I work for.

education.degree: Bachelors of Science in Computer Science & Engineering
education.description: From my academy I have learnt lots of things such as how to work in a critical situation. How to handle critical stuffs. I have learnt various types of computer languages like c, c++, java, sql. Moreover, I have learnt many algorithms and many more
From 2012 to 2014 I was in college. I have studied different types of subjects such as Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics and many more
I have gained some pure friends from my school life. It was actually the best time ever in my life.

work.title: Researcher and Developer
work.description: Basically I and my team are working on to reduce the air pollution of Dhaka city. The research work is still on process.
